titles.title: Freedom from Regulations Act of 2020
Freedom from Regulations Act of 2020
Freedom from Regulations Act of 2020
To require that independent agencies comply with all requirements of rulemaking, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
